exif:Copyright: The examinations, held by the Bihar School Examination Board (BSEB), began on Tuesday and are scheduled to go on until 24 March. Officials say more than 1.4 million students are taking the tests. They face tremendous pressure because they must pass the exams to continue their education.

software: Photo: Dipankar.When Board examinations are due in Bihar, parents tighten their belts, pull up their socks and transform overnight into expert rock climbers..
